v0.1.1 (November 2, 2016)
++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Hot fix release to make examples executable.

Bug fixes
#########

 * Fix copy of default logging.ini (`issue #235 <https://github.com/oemof/oemof_base/issues/235>`_)
 * Add matplotlib to requirements to make examples executable after installation (`issue #236 <https://github.com/oemof/oemof_base/issues/236>`_)
